page.title: 20CLUBS AND ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: {Interest groups:- a.Amnesty International - Batheaston b.Army Cadet Force -Gloucester Road. c.Barbershop Harmony Club-Swainswick d.Bathford Local History Society e.Bathford Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament f Bathford Canine Society g.Bathford Chess Club h.Bathampton Physically Handicapped and Able Bodied Club i.Friends of Bath Samaritans- Swainswick j.Vendanta Movement -Batheaston k.William Herschel Society- Lambridge l.World Wildlife Fund - Batheaston m.Bathampton Angling Association n.Badminton Club Bathampton
